name: tm28
effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Digs underground
the 1st turn, then
strikes next turn.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Digs underground
the 1st turn, then
strikes next turn.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that hits
on the 2nd turn.
Can also be used
to exit dungeons.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to
exit dungeons.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to
exit dungeons.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to
exit dungeons.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to
exit dungeons.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user burrows, then attacks on the
second turn. It can also be used to

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user burrows, then attacks
on the next turn. It can also
be used to exit dungeons.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is
restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is
restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack.
This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.
